patchinfo.issue: L3: curl-openssl1 does not allow enforcement of tls 1.2
patchinfo.name: curl
patchinfo.description:
This update for curl fixes the following issues:
- Report the correct TLS version in use when using verbose mode (-v). (bsc#977409)
For the TLS 1.2 enabled version to be found in curl-openssl1 (in the SECURITY Module): - Allow enforcing TLS 1.1 or 1.2 on the curl commandline, using --tlsv1.1 or --tlsv1.2. (bsc#977409)
